p: I've just rec'd an enthusiastic letter from Laiham of MacMillans about Jed: this is a paragraph: "The MS has now been read by our advisers, and also by myself & by others here, and I send you our hearty congratulations. What a satisfaction it must be to have completed this splendid Cycle begun so many years ago, and to complete it so well! Jed Smith is, I think, a completely satisfying pieve of work, probably your best work to date. It has passages of great beauty and power. There is, as I see it, no let down in quality from first to last."
The rest is about promotion. Mitchell of Hollywood writes hopefully of the fall & winter season, but we're not sure yet of the summer.
